{
    "number": 118813,
    "data": "3628679,87178286159,20922789847679,265252859812191058635000805631999",
    "name": "Primes of the form (2n)! - n! - 1.",
    "comment": [
        "The term a(7) (2407 digits) is too large to include even in the b-file.",
        "All the numbers end in 9.",
        "For all n, (2n)! - n! - 1 has exactly A027868(n) trailing 9s. - _Rick L. Shepherd_, Feb 16 2014",
        "Generated by n = 5, 7, 8, 15, 103, 179, .... - _R. J. Mathar_, Sep 20 2012 (now A238011)"
    ],
    "reference": [
        "G. Balzarotti and P. P. Lava, Le sequenze di numeri interi, Hoepli, 2008, p. 159."
    ],
    "link": [
        "Rick L. Shepherd, <a href=\"/A118813/b118813.txt\">Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..6</a>"
    ],
    "example": [
        "For n=5, (2*5)! - 5! - 1 = 3628800 - 120 - 1 = 3628679, which is prime."
    ],
    "maple": [
        "PFACT:=proc(N) local i,r; for i from 1 by 1 to N do r:=(2*i)!-i!-1; if isprime(r) then print(i); fi; od; end: PFACT(100);"
    ],
    "xref": [
        "Cf. A238011 (corresponding n), A118812, A237443."
    ],
    "keyword": "nonn",
    "offset": "1,1",
    "author": "_Paolo P. Lava_ and _Giorgio Balzarotti_, May 23 2006",
    "references": 2,
    "revision": 13,
    "time": "2014-02-17T06:12:51-05:00",
    "created": "2006-09-29T03:00:00-04:00"
}
